caption: Ghazgkull Mag Uruk Thraka, Prophet of the Waaagh!, showcasing volumetric highlights, feathering, non-metallic metal, Freehanding and minimal object source lighting. Painted to high-end standard.
alt: A photograph of a Ghazgkull Thraka model with non-metallic metal, rust and weathering effects, freehanded checkerboard pattern, and red object source lighting from below the head.

caption: A Heretic Astartes Demon Prince with wings, showcasing glazing, non-metallic metal, and subtle glow effects.
alt: A photograph of a Demon Prince model with silver non-metallic metal armour trim, dark red armour and red glowing runes on the sword.
